categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Pig-face was the nickname Han Solo gave to a sapient, brown-furred, bipedal primate he accidentally bumped into during a brawl with Warto at Locru's Central Saloon. Insulting her with the nickname—and by not realizing she was even a female— Han earned the ire of her boyfriend who took a swing at Han, but missed.
